insert_job: BCN_MF_Batch_Initiator   job_type: BOX 
owner: batchprod.service@B09
permission: 
date_conditions: 1
run_calendar: CTS.Mon_thru_Fri
start_times: "15:20"
description: "Do not hold this box. To hold batch, hold the job BCN.00.00_Batch_Start."
alarm_if_fail: 1
alarm_if_terminated: 1
group: BCN_FACE_MF
application: BOX.FACETS-NOTCOUNTED.H

command: cd c:\clientfiles\resources\BCN && jil < BCN_UTILITY.ResourceControl_open.jil
machine: a02tidexp0005.a02.cishoc.com
owner: tidalprd.service
permission: 
date_conditions: 0
description: "This job Brings UP Resources for BCN_Facets Notes: For all failures, force start the job. If the job fails more than three times, page scheduling."
alarm_if_fail: 1
alarm_if_terminated: 1
group: BCN_FACE_UT
application: UTILITY-NOTCOUNTED.NH


/* ----------------- BCN_UT.ResourceControl_CLOSE ----------------- */ 

insert_job: BCN_UT.ResourceControl_CLOSE   job_type: CMD 
command: cd c:\clientfiles\resources\BCN && jil < BCN_UTILITY.ResourceControl_close.jil
machine: a02tidexp0005.a02.cishoc.com
owner: tidalprd.service
permission: 
date_conditions: 0
description: "This job Shut down\\Bring down resources for BCN Facets UT view: For all failures, force start the job. If the job fails more than three times, page Scheduling."
std_out_file: "c:\WAAE_LOGS\%AUTO_JOB_NAME%_$${MM}$${DD}$${YYYY}_%AUTORUN%.out"
std_err_file: "c:\WAAE_LOGS\%AUTO_JOB_NAME%_$${MM}$${DD}$${YYYY}_%AUTORUN%.err"
alarm_if_fail: 1
alarm_if_terminated: 1
group: BCN_FACE_UT
application: UTILITY-NOTCOUNTED.NH

owner: batchprod.service@B09
permission: 
date_conditions: 1
run_calendar: CTS.Mon_thru_Sat
start_mins: 15
run_window: "00:05-15:30"
condition: s(BCN_MF_0_umi_trig.ksh.FT00) & s(BCN_MF_08.01_EOBMarker) & s(BCN_SA_08.01_EOBMarker) & s(BCN_MF_CF04.02_EOCMarker_Post_Cap)
description: "Important: This is an adhoc group to process umi set of jobs if the umi stream was skipped in last night's schedule due to delay in file. If UMI file is not received by 6 pm MT all umi jobs gets skipped in nightly schedule by skip jobs BCN_MF_UMI_Stream_Skip and BCN_SA_UMI_Stream_Skip, and it is processed by this box after that night's EOBMarker completion. /* ----------------- BCN_UT_NLX_Inbound_Skip ----------------- */ 

insert_job: BCN_UT_NLX_Inbound_Skip   job_type: CMD 
command: cd c:\ClientFiles\Scripts\BCN && BCN_UT_NLX_Inbound_Skip.bat
machine: a02tidexp0005.a02.cishoc.com
owner: tidalprd.service
permission: 
date_conditions: 1
run_calendar: CTS.Thu_and_Fri
start_times: "16:30"
description: "This job is to kill-set NLX Inbound stream if the 1st job from the box is either not complete or running at 4:30 pm MT. This job is created to handle the situation where the NLX Inbound stream receives the file after 3:50 pm but it doesn't run due it dependent job getting activated at 3:50 pm MT and runs incorrectly after the NLX outbound is complete for next day##RITM0142477"
